description: React component for managing and displaying user study sessions, including fetching data from an API, filtering, editing, and deleting sessions.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches session data from API and updates state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a session by ID after user confirmation.

methods.name: onInlineUpdate
methods.description: Prompts user to update session details and sends update to API.
